ComicInfo.Title: Settling the Howard Stern Case on Judge Judy; A Mad Look at Cops; A More Complete Array of Directional and Signal Lights; Political Pokémon; 6 Degrees of Separation Between Anyone and Anything Part IV; All-New Even Yet Still More Badly Needed Warning Labels for Rock Albums; Mad’s Dysfunctional Family Tree; Practical Joke Items Guaranteed to Put the “Fun” Back in Funerals; Final Episodes of Peanuts You Never Saw; Monroe and… the Internet; A Magazine Publisher’s Sweepstakes Letter We’d Like to See; The Last Thing You Want to Hear…; The Yellow Mile
ComicInfo.Summary: A parody of what really should be written on CD warning labels.
